Review: The pizza was hot and fresh, and the garlic bread was crispy. Service was quick and friendly.
The curry was rich and flavorful, but the naan was slightly cold when served.
Absolutely loved the aroma and taste of the biryani. Portion size was generous and worth the price.
The burger was average and a bit dry. Fries were okay but nothing special.
Creamy and delicious pasta! One of the best I’ve had in a long time. Will definitely order again.
The dosa was crispy but the sambar lacked flavor. Chutney was good though.
Too oily and salty for my taste. Didn’t enjoy it as much as expected.
Fresh ingredients and well-balanced dressing. A healthy and satisfying meal.
The cheesecake was soft, rich, and perfectly sweet. Absolutely loved it!
The tacos were cold and lacked seasoning. Quite disappointing overall.
